輡字的基本解释

輡
kǎn
〔輡轲（
k?）〕古同“坎坷”，道路不平，喻人生曲折多艰或不得志。

輡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kǎn］
［《廣韻》苦感切，上感，溪。］
［《廣韻》苦紺切，去勘，溪。］
亦作“輡1”。亦作“1”。
见“轗軻”。

輡字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輡； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1245第01
【廣韻】【正韻】【韻會】?苦感切，音坎。【玉篇】輡?，車行不平也。　又【集韻】不得志也。　亦作轗。互詳前軻字註。《廣韻》轗軻，車行不利。

輡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
輡字的起名意思

暂无。

輡
Basic explanation of words
輡
kǎn
〔輡轲(
k?)] Gu Tong is "bumpy" and the road is uneven, which shows how difficult or unwilling life is to twists and turns.
輡
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［kǎn］
["Guangyun" has a sense of bitterness, feeling on it, and creek. ]
["Guangyun" bitter cyanosis, go to survey, stream. ]
Also known as "輡1". Also known as "1".
See "轗轲".
輡
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Car Character Department] 　輡; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1245 No. 01
[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? A sense of bitterness, sound barriers. [Jade articles] 輡? The traffic is uneven.　[Jiyun] It’s not a good idea.　 also made 轗. Note the words before each other. In "Guangyun", the car is unfavorable.
